project_components

Class FittedComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • project_components.Component
      • project_components.FittedComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FittedCar, FittedCarFrame, FittedDoor, Shaft

    public class FittedComponent
extends Component
    This class models a component once is assigned to a project, in order to be drawn. For this reason it extends the Component class with drawing-related attributes
    Author:
    Enrico Ferro

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int drawingStartingPoint_x
      X coordinate of the component on the drawing plane
      private int drawingStartingPoint_y
      Y coordinate of the component on the drawing plane
      private java.util.ArrayList<DrawingObject> drawingStructure
      List of the drawingObjects used to define the component during rendering

        public java.util.ArrayList<DrawingObject> getDrawingStructure()

      • render

        public void render(AiLiftProject2D myProject)
        Primitive method to "render" (that is create the rendering string for the ".jscad" file) the FittedComponent. It creates a rendering object for each element in drawingStructure and adds it to the project. The extrusion factor, used to give a 3D effect to the project drawing, is set to 1 by default. It's changed overriding the function in children classes if needed.
        Parameters:
        myProject - rendering project to be populated with rendering elements
